title: Schreibwerkstatt Offenbach
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202625/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202625/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Organizations) : Schreibwerkstatt Offenbach**

_Schreibwerkstatt Klingspor Offenbach e.V. für Kalligrafie_, the Offenbach/Klingspor Calligraphy Workshop

Founded by [Karlgeorg Hoefer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202625/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Karlgeorg%20Hoefer) during the 1980s, this organization offers calligraphy courses to the public. They also organize lectures and exhibitions.

Their website may be found at: [www.schreibwerkstatt-klingspor.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202625/http:/www.schreibwerkstatt-klingspor.de/)

They are loosely associated with the [Klingspor Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202625/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor%20Museum).
author: dan_reynolds
